session_summary: Jolene, buzzing from a night out, spoke with Deborah at 4:12 pm on 22 February, 2023. Deborah found solace in a garden after losing a friend, where she cherished memories and photos. Jolene admired the flowers and they discussed travel, with Deborah fondly recalling Bali. They also talked about trying beach yoga. Deborah encouraged Jolene to enjoy the experience and advised her to take care.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a plate of food and a glass of wine
conversation_turns.text: Hey Deborah, totally buzzing! Had a great night out last night - dinner, and drinks with my friends. So glad I got to let my hair down. You?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a garden with a bunch of flowers in buckets
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great, Jolene! I just visited this place and it was so calming. Nostalgic too.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, those flowers are beautiful! What type are they? It looks so peaceful there.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: The roses and dahlias bring me peace. I lost a friend last week, so I've been spending time in the garden to find some comfort.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Sorry to hear about your friend, Deb. Losing someone can be really tough. How are you holding up?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Thanks for the kind words. It's been tough, but I'm comforted by remembering our time together. It reminds me of how special life is.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Memories can give us so much comfort and joy.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two women are riding on a motorcycle on a dirt road
conversation_turns.text: Memories keep our loved ones close. This is the last photo with Karlie which was taken last summer when we hiked. It was our last one. We had such a great time! Every time I see it, I can't help but smile.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, looks like a great trip! Where else have you traveled?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a swing on a beach with a blue sky
conversation_turns.text: I've been blessed to travel to a few places and Bali last year was one of my favs. It was a gorgeous island that gave me peace, great for yoga.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that's great! Is yoga on the beach a thing? I've been wanting to try it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: The sound of the waves and the fresh air is wonderful!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'll definitely give it a go! It sounds peaceful. Thanks!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Let me know how it goes. Enjoy it!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'll keep you posted if I decide to go there.

Deborah: Deborah copes with Karlie's passing away by visiting flower gardens and remembering their time together.
Jolene: Jolene goes out with her friends for dinner and drinks to let her hair down.

Deborah: Deborah finds peace and comfort in roses and dahlias in her garden after losing a friend last week.
A photo of the last hike with her friend Karlie brings a smile to Deborah's face whenever she sees it.
Deborah traveled to Bali last year, one of her favorite places, for peace and yoga.
